sentences.en: Biometrics promises identities that are virtually impossible to steal, impersonate or misplace.
sentences.cn: 这种生物科技测量标准的特徵是近几乎不可能被偷取, 假扮,或误置.

sentences.en: Guests frequently misplace or leave behind their personal possessions in hotel rooms.
sentences.cn: 客人经常误放东西或把他们的个人物品落在房间里.

sentences.en: I often misplace something that she should have put away.
sentences.cn: 我经常把她本该放起来的东西放错了地方.

sentences.en: Oh dear, I seem to have misplaced the letter.
sentences.cn: 哎呀，我好像忘了把信放在什么地方。

trans.tran_cn: 放错地方；忘记把…放在什么地方；错误地信任某人
trans.tran_en: to lose something for a short time by putting it in the wrong place

trans.tran_cn: 把（感情等）寄托于不值得寄托的对象，忘记把…放在什么地方，把…放错位置
